title: Computer With Keyboard And Mouse, "iMac", 1999
medium: plastic, rubber, glass, metal, electronic components
provenance: Received directly from Apple Computer for "Design Culture Now: National Design Triennial," then acquired by CHNDM.
dimensions:
H x W x D: 38 x 38.5 x 42.5cm (14 15/16 x 15 3/16 x 16 3/4in.)
Other (b) keyboard H x W x D: 4 x 39.2 x 14 cm (1 9/16 x 15 7/16 x 5 1/2 in.)
Other (c) mouse H x W x D: 42.5 x 8 cm (16 3/4 x 3 1/8 in.)
description: Egg-shaped computer/monitor unit (a) of translucent clear and blue plastic, with screen, CD drawer and two small speakers at front; carry handle inset in top rear; retractable blue foot bar on underside at front.  Two accompanying components are also of translucent clear and blue plastic: one, a flat rectangular keyboard (b) with black keys, retractable foot bar and cord; the other, a circular mouse with cord (c).

tombstone.epitaph:
Computer With Keyboard And Mouse, "iMac", 1999.
1999. plastic, rubber, glass, metal, electronic components. Gift of Apple Computer. 2000-63-1-a/c.
